privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.overview_text: General Market is a decentralized protocol for on-chain index products. We collect minimal data and prioritize your privacy.
privacy.collect_wallets_desc: Public blockchain addresses used for trading
privacy.collect_txs_desc: On-chain trading activity (publicly visible on the Index L3 chain)
privacy.no_collect_keys: Private keys — These never leave your local environment
privacy.no_collect_identity: Personal identity — We don't require KYC or personal information
privacy.no_collect_browsing: Browsing data — We don't use tracking cookies
privacy.blockchain_text: All trading activity occurs on the Index L3 chain, a public blockchain. Your wallet address and transaction history are publicly visible on block explorers. This is inherent to blockchain technology, not a choice we make.
privacy.storage_text: ITP configurations and order data are stored on-chain. Off-chain data (like price feeds and NAV calculations) is processed by authorized issuers and stored temporarily.
privacy.third_party_text: We interact with CoinGecko for price data and Morpho for lending markets. We don't sell or share your data with advertisers or data brokers.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.acceptance_text: By using General Market, you agree to these terms. If you don't agree, don't use the platform.
terms.what_is_text: General Market is an institutional-grade protocol for on-chain index products. It runs on the Index L3 chain using smart contracts. You can create, trade, and manage tokenized index tracking products (ITPs).
terms.risk_text: Trading index products involves significant risk. ITP values fluctuate with underlying asset prices. You could lose some or all of your capital. Only use funds you can afford to lose.
terms.experimental_text: General Market is experimental software. Smart contracts are immutable once deployed—bugs cannot be patched. Use at your own risk. We make no guarantees about security, uptime, or functionality.
terms.responsibilities_keys: You control your private keys — we can't recover them if lost
terms.responsibilities_decisions: You're responsible for your trading decisions
terms.responsibilities_laws: You must comply with laws in your jurisdiction
terms.responsibilities_tax: You're responsible for tax obligations on any profits
terms.no_advice_text: Nothing on General Market is financial advice. We don't recommend specific trades, indices, or strategies.
terms.prohibited_illegal: Using the platform for illegal activity
terms.liability_text: General Market is provided "as is" without warranties. We're not liable for losses from trading, bugs, hacks, smart contract failures, or any other cause.
terms.changes_text: We may update these terms. Continued use after changes means you accept the new terms.
